title: Task-Based Advanced Turkish Practical Communication Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Turkish vocabulary and grammar at CEFR C1 level
context.additional_context: A mobile learning environment emphasizing simulation of work environments using digital devices. Task performance based on real-world scenarios in administrative/managerial roles.

learning_goals: Core data can be extracted from Turkish business reports and orally presented
Negotiation tasks can be performed using specialized terminology in virtual business meeting scenarios
Turkish business documents provided via mobile platforms can be error-free and submitted for peer evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
